Title: How Emotion Wheel is used to understand feelings?
Author: Abdul-Qayyum
Published Date: 2025-05-14T12:28:22.000Z
URL: https://renewedmentalhealthgroup.com/how-emotion-wheel-is-used-to-understand-feelings/
Text: 
 An emotion wheel is a visual tool or a circular representation of emotions that helps individuals identify, understand, and process their emotions. Individuals become more emotionally aware by using the emotion wheel or feelings wheel. In addition, the emotion wheel helps develop emotional intelligence and improve communication with others. By giving words to your emotions, you can prioritize your mental health. Identifying emotions and taking the right action to manage emotions on time is vital for the well-being of individuals. 
 This article gives an insight into the emotion wheel and its significance in identifying and articulating emotions. Using an emotion wheel, you will get a complete idea of how you can understand your feelings. So letâ€™s start! 
 What is an Emotion wheel? 
 The emotion wheel is also known as the feelings wheel.Â  It is a visual representation of the emotions, which are all organized in a circular or wheel-like format. Emotion wheels assist individuals to recognize and explain their complex

Title: The Emotion Wheel: What It Is and How to Use It - Positive Psychology
Author: Hokuma Karimova, MA
Published Date: 2017-12-24T08:48:47.000Z
URL: https://positivepsychology.com/emotion-wheel/
Text: The Emotion Wheel: What It Is and How to Use It
[Emotional Intelligence](https://positivepsychology.com/category/emotional-intelligence/)
**30 Oct 2025
[**55](#comment-list)
# The Emotion Wheel: What It Is and How to Use It [+PDF]
**24 Dec 2017**by**[Hokuma Karimova, MA](https://positivepsychology.com/team/hokuma-karimova/)**
**Scientifically reviewed by**[Tiffany Sauber Millacci, Ph.D.](https://positivepsychology.com/team/tiffany-millacci/)****
### Key Insights
15 minute read
* The emotion wheel is a tool that helps individuals identify & articulate their feelings by categorizing emotions into core, nuanced variations.
* Using an emotion wheel can enhance emotional intelligence, improve self-awareness & facilitate better communication.
* Regularly engaging with the emotion wheel can support emotional regulation & help manage complex feelings effectively.
![Plutchik's Wheel of Emotions: What is it and How to Use it in Counseling?](https://positive.b-cdn.net/wp-content/uploads/wheel-of-emotions-2-300x150.jpg "Plutchik'
